data.title: Standard B Site Execute Sky Smoke Placements
data.description: Here are the default smokes for a B Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Defender's options.

data.title: Standard A Site Execute Sky Smokes for Tree and Rafters
data.description: Here are the default smokes for an A Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen.

data.title: Aggressive Catwalk Push Sky Smokes
data.description: Use these Sky Smokes to take space in mid, push up Catwalk, and either pressure or push into A Site through Tree with your team.
